name: Sad Alien
description:
**Quality of game is best on full screen mode!**

Your girlfriend (or now currently your ex-girlfriend) has kicked you out from your home planet. Collect your personal items she has thrown out into space and push them into your UFO's beam. Don't get zapped into the beam with your belongings--there are plenty more items floating around that need to be saved!

Watch out for the Space Boogies that not only steal your belongings but can destroy you as well!

Move: Keys A, S, D, W

Rotate: Keys Z, X

Shoot: Key C
